DaBenBillingState.description:
未提交 Created = 0
 已提交 Submitted = 1
 蓝票 BlueInvoice = 2
 红票 RedInvoice = 3
 作废 Abandoned = 4
 冲红 OffsetRed = 5
 异常 Ls = 999

DaBenInvoiceStatus.description:
未开票 UnBilled = 0
 开票中 BillingIn = 1
 开票成功 BillingSuccess = 2
 开票失败 BillingFailure = 3

DaBenInvoiceType.description:
大贲的发票类型
 专票 SpecialTicket = 0
 普票 OrdinaryTickets = 1
 数电票-专票 SDP_SpecialTicket = 31
 数电票-普票 SDP_OrdinaryTickets = 32
 电子普通发票 ElectronicOrdinaryTickets = 51
 异常 Non = -1

DaBenSourceSystem.description:
SAP SAPPaper = 0
 SAP SAPElectronics = 1
 手工Excel ExcelPaper = 2
 手工Excel ExcelElectronics = 3
 标记已开 ManualBackFill = 4
 手动关联 ManualCorrelation = 5
 手工核销 ManualCancellation = 6
 手工补充 BCSJ = 7
 自动核销 ZDHX = 8
 异常 Err = -1
